data.name: RPGScenery - Stairway in a Gorge Scene
data.detailed_description:
In this pack, you can find a scene about a long stairway which leads up to the top of a mountain between huge rocks. You'll find an ancient Portal and an awesome view of a faraway mountaintop that rises above the clouds on the top.

This DLC contains 4 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
